Name: Radio Free Europa
About the game: Radio Free Europa is a top-down 2.5D Spaceship shooter set in our own solar system. The people living out on the fringes of the Solar Federation have been mistreated to the breaking point and you're their last hope to get a message of their plight back to Earth. Choose from multiple playable ships, each with different characteristics and weapons. Upgrade as you go, salvaging weapons and upgrades from defeated enemies. Choose your route, with each sector bringing unique enemies, bosses, and upgrades. Multiple difficulties mean that even once you think you've mastered the game there is still more challenge ahead!
